episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a wide range of quirky and fascinating topics, including the peculiarities of international week numbering, the challenges faced by an Indian luger, the history of Old McDonald variations, and the bizarre story of a farmhouse with millions of IP addresses linked to it. The hosts also delve into the history of temperance bars, the peculiarities of chess cheating, and the humorous tale of a naval battle between a Venezuelan patrol vessel and a cruise ship.
